title: Sonnet 76 - The poem's final two lines

content.question: The poemâ€™s final two lines do which of the following?

choices.label: Reinforce the mood established in the opening lines
Undercut the argument of the poem by pointing out a logical inconsistency
Present a simile that resolves a contradiction described in the preceding lines
Interrupt a regular metric pattern to indicate a change in subject matter

content.answer: Present a simile that resolves a contradiction described in the preceding lines

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
